title: All shortcut tiles on new tab page have turned white and no longer do anything
content:
On my new tab page, I had 8 shortcut tiles configured with custom icons for quick access to those sites. Now all those icons are default white squares that don't do anything when clicked.

Also, if I try to edit one and recreate what it was previously, it appears to accept my input but then nothing happens when I click the shortcut. If I edit that shortcut again, the stuff I entered is gone.

So basically, the shortcut tile feature on the new tab page is non-functional for me. (This is on the current version of Firefox (97.0.1) for Windows 10 (version 2004, build 19041.1415).
creator: mattsg

title: Prevent websites from opening new tabs
content: I just reinstalled my operative system, and with that my Firefox settings got reset. I know there is an entry in about:config to prevent ads from opening new tabs and pop ups without authorization, even from legit websites like the login pop-up windows when doing a sign in in Google, in those cases to allow the windows it's needed to click on the lock icon next to the URL bar and allow it from there. The problem is that I don't remember the name of that setting and I have spend an hour looking for it on Google.
creator: ttfh3500

title: 3rd party browser management ?
content: fire fox informs me that my browser is being managed by my organization ? i do not belong to any organization they have blocked several About pages , and assigned themselves privileges apparently , how do i delete this "eye in the sky" and block them ? the organization is Enterprise
creator: randall522

title: reCAPTCHA screens wont display and therefor cant be answered to proceed within website
content: Sites that require reCAPTCHA to be used will not work in your FIREFOX application. Several applications, or utilities or financial institutions that require CAPTCHA response and security verification to continue will not work with your application. They work fine with MICROSOFT EDGE.
creator: RonaldTBaginski

title: Firefox menu's switched to some sort of dark mode after a previous update
content: Hi, I am using the most recent firefox on windows 10. A few months ago with an update that occurred at the time, firefox suddenly switched to some sort of dark mode - ie all text was white with black background. I found others online with the same issue and with their help was able to change the main view back, however all the menu's and any popup dialogue options are still in this mode. I have attached a screen shot.
creator: dfilby

title: Regardless of settings, Login Emails are Always Present
content:
No Matter What I Do, Firefox will constantly have email login addresses available to forms.

I've tried resetting Privacy Settings, and also will hit "Shift + Delete" to remove the login email(s).

However, after I login 1 single time, the email address is once again available for someone to easily see.

This makes Firefox 100% UNSAFE to use when logging into websites such as Financial, Medical, and plain & simple... Everything.

Is there any way to stop this from happening?!?
creator: dasatec
